Package com.azure.android.communication.calling

Class CallCaptions

  • Object
    • CallCaptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommunicationCaptions, TeamsCaptions
    public abstract class CallCaptions
extends Object
    Call captions for managing common captions functionality.
